text: HD 49674 (also known as Nervia) is a star similar to the Sun. It has an exoplanet known as HD 49674 b orbiting around it. It is located in the northern constellation of Auriga. It is 1.01 times the radius of the Sun. It has an apparent visual magnitude of 8.10 and this way is an eighth-magnitude star that is too faint to be visible readily to the naked eye. The system is located 140.6 light-years from the Sun, and it is moving further away with a radial velocity of +12 km/s. == References == Category:Stars
title: HD 49674
